g.text: 309of the received block c. Using matrix notation, we make this calculation by multiplying the received block c by the matrix H known as the parity check matrix. It is formed from the generator matrix G by taking the bottom, error-correction portion of G and attaching to it an identity matrix. For our (7,4)code,
